price: Dájúdájú Àwa fi àwọn ìràwọ̀ ṣe sánmọ̀ ilé ayé ní ọ̀ṣọ́
arabic: إِنَّا زَيَّنَّا ٱلسَّمَآءَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا بِزِينَةٍ ٱلۡكَوَاكِبِ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: innā zayyannā al-samāa al-dun'yā bizīnatin al-kawākibi
